ol.li: On the Ceph administration node, extract the volumes client key:[ceph-user@ice-admin cluster]$ cat ceph.client.volumes.keyring | grep \ key | awk ‘{print $3}’| tee client.volumes.key

On the Ceph administration node, create a secret.xml file containing the following contents.GENERATED_UUID is replaced with the UUID created in .<secret ephemeral='no' private='no' > <uuid>GENERATED_UUID</uuid> <usage type='ceph'> <name>client.volumes secret</name> </usage> </secret>

Copy the secret.xml and client.volumes.key files to each compute node:[ceph-user@ice-admin cluster]$ scp secret.xml client.volumes.key \ ospcomp1: [ceph-user@ice-admin cluster]$ scp secret.xml client.volumes.key \ ospcomp2:
On each compute node, define the secret for libvirt:[ceph-user@ospcomp1 ~]$ sudo virsh secret-define --file secret.xml

On each compute node, use the UUID to add the contents of the secret key.
Replace the UUID command argument with the UUID from the file. [ceph-user@ospcomp1 ~]$ sudo virsh secret-set-value --secret UUID \ --base64 `cat client.volumes.key`
On each compute node, print the virsh secrets, and verify the new secret is added:[ceph-user@ospcomp1 ~]$ sudo virsh secret-list
You can now remove the client.volumes.key and secret.xml files from each compute node:[ceph-user@ospcomp1 ~]$ rm client.volumes.key secret.xml
